schema_version.title: Schema Version
schema_version.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned by the server. The version of the JSON schema that the server uses to validate the object. Schema version indicates generation of schema used to save version to to enable upgrade steps to work. Individual schemas should set the default.

accession.title: Accession
accession.description: A unique identifier to be used to reference the object.
accession.comment: Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.

alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions
alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.

items.title: Alternate Accession
items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.

aliases.title: Lab aliases
aliases.description: Lab specific identifiers to reference an object.

items.title: Lab alias
items.description: A lab specific identifier to reference an object.
items.comment: Current convention is colon separated lab name and lab identifier. (e.g. john-doe:42).

date_created.title: Date created
date_created.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned by the server. The date the object is created.

submitted_by.title: Submitted by
submitted_by.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned by the server. The user that created the object.

references.title: References
references.description: The identifiers that reference data found in the object.

items.title: Reference
items.description: An identifier that references data found in the object.

lab.title: Lab
lab.comment: See lab.json for list of available identifiers.

award.title: Grant
award.comment: See award.json for list of available identifiers.

href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

biosample_term_id.title: Ontology ID
biosample_term_id.comment: NTR is a new term request identifier provided by the DCC.

product_id.title: Product ID
product_id.description: The product identifier provided by the originating lab or vendor.

lot_id.title: Lot ID
lot_id.description: The lot identifier provided by the originating lab or vendor.

strain_background.title: Strain background
strain_background.description: The specific parent strain designation of a non-human donor.

strain_name.title: Strain name
strain_name.description: The specific strain designation of a non-human donor.

genotype.title: Strain genotype
genotype.description: The genotype of the strain according to accepted nomenclature conventions.

mutagen.title: Mutagen
mutagen.description: The mutagen used to create the strain, if applicable

constructs.title: DNA constructs
constructs.description: Expression or targeting vectors stably or transiently transfected (not RNAi).

items.title: DNA Constructs
items.description: An expression or targeting vector stably or transiently transfected (not RNAi).

mutated_gene.title: Mutated gene
mutated_gene.description: The gene that was altered/disrupted resulting in a loss of function.

assay_term_name.title: Assay name
assay_term_name.description: OBI (Ontology for Biomedical Investigations) ontology term for the assay.

assay_term_id.title: Assay ID
assay_term_id.description: OBI (Ontology for Biomedical Investigations) ontology identifier for the assay.
